mapper.sql: ID, WITHDRAW_BATCH_ID, MEMBER_ID, SOURCE_ACC_NO, DEST_ACC_NO, WITHDRAW_AMT, WITHDRAW_CCY, WITHDRAW_FEE, DEST_AMT, DEST_CCY, WITHDRAW_RATE, DEDUCT_AMT, TRANSFER_STATE, REMARKS, CREATE_AT, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_AT, UPDATE_BY, CHANNEL_NAME
mapper.insert: /**TUserWithdrawSumMapper.insertUserWithdrawSum**/ INSERT INTO T_USER_WITHDRAW_SUM ( WITHDRAW_BATCH_ID, MEMBER_ID, SOURCE_ACC_NO, DEST_ACC_NO, WITHDRAW_AMT, WITHDRAW_CCY, WITHDRAW_FEE, DEST_AMT, DEST_CCY, WITHDRAW_RATE, DEDUCT_AMT, TRANSFER_STATE, REMARKS, CREATE_AT, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_AT, UPDATE_BY, CHANNEL_NAME )VALUES ( #{withdrawBatchId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sourceAccNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destAccNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{withdrawAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{withdrawCcy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{withdrawFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{destAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{destCcy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{withdrawRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deductAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{transferState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW(), #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW(), #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
